PackageOracle.name: DA_SOURCE_FTA
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_SOURCE_FTA
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.18.269835000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,accounting_fta_id IN NUMBER
,billing_station_id IN NUMBER
,source_fta_cd IN VARCHAR2
,gl_id IN VARCHAR2
,telephone_gl_id IN VARCHAR2
,geocode_txt IN VARCHAR2
,dma_cd IN VARCHAR2
,lineup_id IN NUMBER
,fcc_community_id IN VARCHAR2
,phone_accounting_system_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,accounting_fta_id IN NUMBER
,billing_station_id IN NUMBER
,source_fta_cd IN VARCHAR2
,gl_id IN VARCHAR2
,telephone_gl_id IN VARCHAR2
,geocode_txt IN VARCHAR2
,dma_cd IN VARCHAR2
,lineup_id IN NUMBER
,fcc_community_id IN VARCHAR2
,phone_accounting_system_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,source_fta_id IN NUMBER
,accounting_fta_id IN NUMBER
,billing_station_id IN NUMBER
,source_fta_cd IN VARCHAR2
,gl_id IN VARCHAR2
,telephone_gl_id IN VARCHAR2
,geocode_txt IN VARCHAR2
,dma_cd IN VARCHAR2
,lineup_id IN NUMBER
,fcc_community_id IN VARCHAR2
,phone_accounting_system_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,source_fta_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_source_fta;

body.name: DA_SOURCE_FTA
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_SOURCE_FTA
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.18.282012000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,accounting_fta_id IN NUMBER
,billing_station_id IN NUMBER
,source_fta_cd IN VARCHAR2
,gl_id IN VARCHAR2
,telephone_gl_id IN VARCHAR2
,geocode_txt IN VARCHAR2
,dma_cd IN VARCHAR2
,lineup_id IN NUMBER
,fcc_community_id IN VARCHAR2
,phone_accounting_system_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_source_fta.add(fx), parms=' || accounting_fta_id || '|' || billing_station_id || '|' || source_fta_cd || '|' || gl_id || '|' || telephone_gl_id || '|' || geocode_txt || '|' || dma_cd || '|' || lineup_id || '|' || fcc_community_id || '|' || phone_accounting_system_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_source_fta a
(
a.source_fta_id
,a.accounting_fta_id
,a.billing_station_id
,a.source_fta_cd
,a.gl_id
,a.telephone_gl_id
,a.geocode_txt
,a.dma_cd
,a.lineup_id
,a.fcc_community_id
,a.phone_accounting_system_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_source_fta_id.NEXTVAL
,add.accounting_fta_id
,add.billing_station_id
,add.source_fta_cd
,add.gl_id
,add.telephone_gl_id
,add.geocode_txt
,add.dma_cd
,add.lineup_id
,add.fcc_community_id
,add.phone_accounting_system_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.source_fta_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_source_fta.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,accounting_fta_id IN NUMBER
,billing_station_id IN NUMBER
,source_fta_cd IN VARCHAR2
,gl_id IN VARCHAR2
,telephone_gl_id IN VARCHAR2
,geocode_txt IN VARCHAR2
,dma_cd IN VARCHAR2
,lineup_id IN NUMBER
,fcc_community_id IN VARCHAR2
,phone_accounting_system_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_source_fta.add, parms=' || accounting_fta_id || '|' || billing_station_id || '|' || source_fta_cd || '|' || gl_id || '|' || telephone_gl_id || '|' || geocode_txt || '|' || dma_cd || '|' || lineup_id || '|' || fcc_community_id || '|' || phone_accounting_system_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_source_fta a
(
a.source_fta_id
,a.accounting_fta_id
,a.billing_station_id
,a.source_fta_cd
,a.gl_id
,a.telephone_gl_id
,a.geocode_txt
,a.dma_cd
,a.lineup_id
,a.fcc_community_id
,a.phone_accounting_system_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_source_fta_id.NEXTVAL
,add.accounting_fta_id
,add.billing_station_id
,add.source_fta_cd
,add.gl_id
,add.telephone_gl_id
,add.geocode_txt
,add.dma_cd
,add.lineup_id
,add.fcc_community_id
,add.phone_accounting_system_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_source_fta.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,source_fta_id IN NUMBER
,accounting_fta_id IN NUMBER
,billing_station_id IN NUMBER
,source_fta_cd IN VARCHAR2
,gl_id IN VARCHAR2
,telephone_gl_id IN VARCHAR2
,geocode_txt IN VARCHAR2
,dma_cd IN VARCHAR2
,lineup_id IN NUMBER
,fcc_community_id IN VARCHAR2
,phone_accounting_system_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_source_fta.add, parms=' || source_fta_id || '|' || accounting_fta_id || '|' || billing_station_id || '|' || source_fta_cd || '|' || gl_id || '|' || telephone_gl_id || '|' || geocode_txt || '|' || dma_cd || '|' || lineup_id || '|' || fcc_community_id || '|' || phone_accounting_system_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_source_fta a
(
a.source_fta_id
,a.accounting_fta_id
,a.billing_station_id
,a.source_fta_cd
,a.gl_id
,a.telephone_gl_id
,a.geocode_txt
,a.dma_cd
,a.lineup_id
,a.fcc_community_id
,a.phone_accounting_system_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.source_fta_id
,add.accounting_fta_id
,add.billing_station_id
,add.source_fta_cd
,add.gl_id
,add.telephone_gl_id
,add.geocode_txt
,add.dma_cd
,add.lineup_id
,add.fcc_community_id
,add.phone_accounting_system_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_source_fta.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,source_fta_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_source_fta.del, parms=' || source_fta_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_source_fta a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.source_fta_id = del.source_fta_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_source_fta.del');

END del;

END da_source_fta;
